decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority (before the building(s) is/are occupied/used).
Condition : 3 - The extension hereby permitted shall not be occupied at any time other than for purposes ancillary to the residential use of the dwelling known as 22 Brainton Avenue.

Condition : 4 - No additional flank windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the western wall of the extension hereby approved without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.
description: Erection of a new front porch, a two storey side extension, single storey rear extension and loft extension to dwellinghouse.
